title: Alexander Statement on the President's Remarks Today about "Over-Testing" (Lamar Alexander)
text: ( Source : Lamar Alexander ) NASHVILLE - U.S. Senator Lamar Alexander, chairman of the Senate education committee and a former U.S. education secretary, released the following statement on the president's remarks today about 'over-testing' in
